name: Exp_Prc_Pnt_Add_EPDPR01K_NonRed
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-DPR01K)*>[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Server Redundancy Requirement?)*>,Non Redundant)){<*SETATVQTY(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-DPR01K, <*eval(FIX((<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>-10000*INT(FIX(<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>/10000))-5000*INT(FIX((<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>-(INT(FIX(<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>/10000)))*10000)/5000))-2000*INT(FIX((<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>-(INT(FIX(<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>/10000)))*10000-(INT(FIX((<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>-(INT(FIX(<*VALUE(Experion Process Points (0 - 45000))*>/10000)))*10000)/5000)))*5000)/2000)))/1000))*>)*>}{0}[ENDIF]<* DoResetAtt *>
